title: Fully equipped fitness center, includes cardio machines!
posting_body: ['Welcome to Lofts at Farmers Market!', '260 5th St E St. Paul, MN 55101', 'Rental Size:', '1 BR - 1 BA - 720 sq ft |', 'Per Month:', '$1615|', 'Lease Length:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'show contact info', 'Life can get busy and stressful, and this is precisely why the place that you call home is so important.', 'When you have a quiet, safe, and beautiful place to put your feet up at the end of a long day, it makes facing tomorrow that much easier.', 'The Lofts at Farmers Market strives to create a peaceful oasis in the heart of Saint Paul, Minnesota where you can relax, refresh, and rejuvenate.', "Lofts at Farmers Market offers studio, one, and two bedroom floor plans that are elegantly designed with the modern conveniences that you're searching for.", 'Each unit comes with spectacular high ceilings, modern stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, cozy kitchen islands with sleek granite counters, and a full-sized washer and dryer.', 'Our community amenities also make the Lofts an exceptional place to live.', 'Work out in our 24-hour fitness center and enjoy the views from our green rooftop terrace complete with fire pit and grill.', 'Before work, be sure to stop by our coffee bar to help start the day off right.', "We're also a pet-friendly community, welcoming cats and certain dog breeds.", 'We even have an on-site pet washing station to keep your furry friend looking and smelling great!', 'Our community features:', '➢ Accepts Credit Card Payments', '➢ Elevator', '➢ Emergency Maintenance', '➢ Free Weight Equipment', '➢ On-Site Maintenance', '➢ Package Receiving', '➢ Parking Garage', '➢ Planned Community Activities', '➢ Rooftop Terrace', '➢ Vending Machines', '➢ 24 Hour Availability', '➢ Bike Repair Stations', '➢ Community-Wide WiFi', '➢ Controlled Access Building', '➢ Dry Cleaning Service Available', '➢ Kingsley Excellence Award', '➢ Pet Washing Station', '➢ Planned Social Activities', '➢ Reservable Clubhouse', '➢ Resident Lounge/ Clubroom', 'Our unit features:', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ Exposed Ductwork', '➢ High Ceilings', '➢ High Speed Internet Access', '➢ Linen Closet*', 'In Select Homes', '➢ Microwave', '➢ Open Floorplan', '➢ Patio/Balcony*', 'In Select Homes', '➢ Stainless Steel Energy Efficient Appliances', '➢ Window Coverings', 'Contact us for more information!', '--', 'show contact info', '--', 'Our Pet-Policy:', 'Dogs and cats welcome: Max. 2 allowed per home, deposit $200, one-time fee $200, monthly rent $40.', 'No weight limit, breed restrictions apply.', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Property Management:', 'Weidner Apartment Homes, LLC', 'Please note pricing and availability subject to change.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '880093CD45234805']
